description.full: With brand news modes and a completely revamped control system, PES 2009 is now even closer to real life football. With the Become a Legend mode you begin your career as a rookie with the aim of becoming one of the icons of the modern game. Tricks, feints and close control are now mapped onto the D pad or analogue stick, making skills much more intuitive. And with a smarter AI system your team mates will be constantly seeking out space, making intelligent runs and calling for the ball. Developments to PES will unite the world of football.
